#summary How to use the Navigating Networks Graph Export API

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

<h1> Export API </h1>

The export API provides the functionality to export data out of the [NavigatingNetworksDataset Navigating Networks Dataset] in a variety of different formats.

The details of the API are as follows:

= Graph Export =

== Base URL ==

The base URL for the Lookup API is as follows:

http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/networks/export?

Combining this URL with the parameters outlines below retrieves data from the [NavigatingNetworksDataset Navigating Networks Dataset].

== Request Type ==

Get Request

== Available Parameters ==

|| *Name* || *Possible Values* || *Optional* || *Default* ||
|| task    || [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIexportGraph#Task:_ego-centric-network-simple ego-centric-network-simple] / event-centric-network 	|| No || ||
|| id      || unique identifier of a contributor || No || ||
|| format  || [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIexportGraph#Format:_graphml graphml], [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIexportGraph#Format:_debug debug] || Yes || graphml ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIexportGraph#Radius radius] || Integer between 1 and 3 || Yes || 1 ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIexportGraph#simplify  simplify|| Boolean || Yes || true ||


== Parameter Definitions ==

=== Task: ego-centric-network-simple ===

An ego centric network that has basic information included the central point of the network is the contributor with the supplied id. 

=== Format: graphml ===

This export format uses the [http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/primer/graphml-primer.html GraphML] data format and includes edges and nodes.

=== Format: debug ===

This export format provides a text based representation of the internal data structures used by the service while compiling the graph. The format is as follows:

id - list of collaborators - number of collaborators in the list

For example:

`111 - 101, 102, 1324, 56789 - 4`

=== Radius ===

The desired number of edges between the central node and the peripheral nodes of the network

=== simplify ===
This parameter is only valid with event to event 2nd degree network (task = event-centric-network && radius = 2 )

simplify = true : with each of the 1st degree nodes, only events for those contributors involved in the central node are retrieved.

simplify = false: with each of the 1st degree nodes, events for all contributors are retrieved.
